# Tender Title: 
RISO - HVAC Equipment Maintenance - DND Gander, NL

## Tender Details: 
* **Reference Number**:  PW-_PWD-009-7882
* **Solicitation Number**:  W6863-225473/A
* **Publication Date**:  2022-10-21
* **Tender Closing Date**:  2022-11-29T12:30:00
* **Contract Value Range**:  $100,001 to $500,000

## Background: 
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites bids for a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the maintenance and repair of Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning (HVAC) equipment at 9 Wing Gander, Gander, NL.

## Overview: 
The RISO will provide maintenance and repair services for commercial and industrial refrigeration, integrated heat systems, heat pumps, electric, electronic, and pneumatic control systems, and air compressors, including components dealing with heating, cooling, and air movement.

## Term and Conditions: 
The RISO term is two (2) years on an as-and-when-requested basis, with an option to extend the term by one (1) year under the same conditions. 

## Information for Suppliers: 
The contract includes a security requirement. It is recommended that bidders visit the site prior to submitting a bid to review existing conditions, determine materials needed, means of access, and temporary facilities required to perform the work. Bidders shall obtain prior permission from the Department of National Defence before carrying out on-site inspections.

## Technical Requirements: 
Bidders are required to download and review the complete tender documents, including amendments, on the Canada Buys platform.

## Deliverables: 
The Contractor is responsible for providing maintenance and repair services for the HVAC equipment. The Contractor will be required to perform the work safely and in accordance with the contract requirements.

## Evaluation Criteria: 
The RISO will be awarded to the lowest price bid that meets the evaluation criteria.

## Contact Information: 
For any inquiries, please contact the Contracting Authority at 709-330-6330 or via email at 
Alexandria.Dwyer@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca.
